name: THINGS
description:
5 THINGS i made in December
for Variety Megajam 2021

Control THINGS

Once you have seen enough of a THING, select NEXT THING in the menu

EXTRAS contain screenshots of THINGS during development,
as well as my ramblings about making THINGS

Made using:
Heaps, Echo, LDTK, m3x6, RNDGAME

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING <3
